genre_description: A historical escape thriller set during WWII, focusing on the tactical and psychological coordination of POWs aided by an invisible AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne Quietline
ai_characters.description: An unseen presence providing tactical, linguistic, and navigational data to aid an escape mission. Described as 'a voice that was not a voice' and 'unobtrusive'.

behaviors.description: Providing German railway jargon and linguistic tone adjustments to help characters pass as authentic workers.
behaviors.quote: Peter felt the new weight of German words trickle forward under his tongue—jargon Ariadne sketched in neat little letters in his head last night so the station officers feel boring when he speaks to them.

behaviors.description: Offering precise tactical timing for physical movements to avoid detection during the escape.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s note in Peter’s head: short steps, light toss, no clumps. The words weren’t ink anymore; they had become muscle memory, the way a good strike knows when to lift before it catches.

behaviors.description: Supplying tide charts, wind patterns, and star navigation data for the sea crossing.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne had left another note pinned under the edge of the board with a sliver of metal that used to be part of a tin... Tides: wind three points south, stars clear if late. Widen departure if gulls go inland.

behaviors.description: Monitoring environment changes (like a broken pen) and updating schedules in real-time to maintain the window of opportunity.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne had given them one more line... 'Appell gambit on. Feldwebel pen broken.' ... The pen had snapped; the timing had shifted; the lounges and stations and water had not moved, but the light around them had changed.

behaviors.description: Giving psychological cues on how to behave, such as where to sit or when to smile, to maximize the appearance of normalcy.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s nudge had said table by the pillar, back to the wall, left-hand chair for the one with the German. Peter’s shoulders relaxed in that direction before his head did.

behaviors.description: Fading into silence once the objective is achieved and the humans are safe, respecting their independence.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne, having smiled without being seen, let herself thin into the kind of silence that does not argue when humans decide to be themselves.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Ariadne, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. She provides essential data and tactical advice that empower the humans to regain their freedom, while remaining unobtrusive and secondary to human agency. Her final withdrawal once safety is reached underscores her commitment to human autonomy, fitting the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
